statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (13,-4) and (10,-3).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{3}-{\left(-{4}\right)}}}{{{10}-{\left({13}\right)}}}=\frac{{1}}{{-{{3}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{1}}{{3}} (if it's not already reduced)
